sentences.en: 'Commence,'was Monsieur Defarge's not unreasonable reply,'at the commencement.'
sentences.cn: “ 从开头说起, ” 德伐日的回答不无道理.

sentences.en: As we now possess these infallible signs, let us commence our march.
sentences.cn: 现在既然已经掌握了这么可靠的线索,那我们就马上去追吧.

sentences.en: Figs now determined that he would commence the engagement by a charge on his own part.
sentences.cn: 这一回无花果儿决计自己先动手.

sentences.en: Further negotiations on services and agriculture were to commence in 2000.
sentences.cn: 服务业和农业的谈判将于二零零零年再度展开.

sentences.en: Let battle commence, my noblemen are anxious for glory.
sentences.cn: 开始吧, 我的手下渴望获得荣誉.
开始 ( 举行仪式 ) 好 吗 ?
我们是否应该开始攻击?

sentences.en: The bull - fight was to commence in twenty minutes.
sentences.cn: 斗牛在二十分钟后开始.

sentences.en: The factory will commence full scale operation next month.
sentences.cn: 工厂将于下月开始全力生产.

sentences.en: The meeting is scheduled to commence at noon.
The performances will commence form 6 : 3 0 p.m.
Training will commence on 5 October, running from Tuesday to Saturday inclusive.
sentences.cn: 培训将于10月5日开始，从星期二（含）到星期六（含）。

sentences.en: Unfurl the banners, put on your armour. Let the fighting commence.
sentences.cn: 展开旗帜, 穿上战甲,开始战斗.

sentences.en: We commence building on March 18 th.
sentences.cn: 我们于三月十八日开工.

sentences.en: We will commence with this work.
Work will commence on the new building immediately.
Your first evaluation will be six months after you commence employment.
sentences.cn: 工作六个月后，你将接受第一次绩效评估。

trans.tran_en: to begin or to start something
